TopicTitle: A mod like persistent trails \0.90 version of it?

Articles.Content:
I know that i'm not the only that needs a 0.90 version of Persistent trails, or something like that mod.

Anyone knows if there is a mod like that?
Persistent Trails works fine in 0.90. Unless you're using the replay feature, which I don't use. Everything else has functioned normally for me so far (path tracking, path editing, path saving, etc)
